new_signals.title: European Energy Reaches 2.1 GW Grid-Connected Renewable Capacity in Denmark
new_signals.summary: European Energy announced reaching 2.1 GW of grid-connected renewable capacity in Denmark, including solar, wind, and battery systems. The company plans to focus in 2026 on upgrading existing assets through the integration of battery systems to improve operational flexibility.

new_signals.title: AI 디지털교과서 정책 조정 - AI 교육자료로 전환

significance.innovation: Shift from replacement to augmentation model
significance.trend: Measured approach to AI in education

new_signals.summary: 교육부가 2026년 정책에서 'AI 디지털교과서'라는 표현을 'AI 교육자료'로 전환하고, 선도학교 1,900교 중심의 단계적 운영으로 방향을 조정했다. AI는 수업 대체가 아닌 학습 성취 분석 도구로 규정된다.

new_signals.title: AMC Robotics Showcases Kyro at CES 2026 - 'ChatGPT Moment for Physical AI'

significance.innovation: Integration of AI with physical robotics

new_signals.summary: AMC Robotics unveiled Kyro at CES 2026, representing what the company calls the 'ChatGPT Moment for Physical AI.' The system demonstrates AI's evolution from digital processing to physical world interaction, reasoning, and action.

new_signals.title: 글로벌 채권 발행 2,480억 달러 기록 - 2026년 첫 주 역대 최고
new_signals.summary: 2026년 첫 일주일 동안 글로벌 채권 판매액이 약 2,480억 달러를 기록하며 전년 동기 대비 26% 급증했다. 기업들이 향후 금리 변동성과 AI 관련 자금 수요에 대비해 앞다투어 자금 조달에 나선 것으로 분석된다.

new_signals.title: UN World Economic Situation and Prospects 2026 Released
new_signals.summary: UN released its World Economic Situation and Prospects 2026 report, forecasting global economic output to grow by 2.7% in 2026, slightly below the 2.8% estimated for 2025. The report highlights that subdued investment and limited fiscal space are weighing on economic activity.

new_signals.title: AI Primary Care Doctor Tools Emerging to Address Doctor Shortage
new_signals.summary: A large health system in Massachusetts is using an AI tool to screen patients and refer them to appropriate care to address the primary care doctor shortage. The development signals a shift toward online-only primary care accessed through AI tools.

new_signals.title: Quantum Security Designated as Top Priority for 2026
new_signals.summary: The Quantum Insider designated 2026 as the Year of Quantum Security, emphasizing post-quantum cryptography and protection of quantum intellectual property. A major initiative launches January 12, 2026, in Washington, D.C., addressing urgent security needs as quantum computing advances.

update_signals.significance: Agentic AI in healthcare represents downstream application of AI wearables and ambient intelligence concepts

update_signals.title: SpaceX Twilight Rideshare Mission Scheduled for January 2026
update_signals.related_title: NASA Artemis II 2026년 2월 발사 - 52년 만에 달 유인 비행 복귀
update_signals.relationship: Both signal space exploration acceleration in early 2026
